alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 08 at 2:26PM EST until February 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Chautauqua and Southern Erie counties. On Thursday, the strongest winds will be localized between the Lake Erie shoreline and Chautauqua Ridge. More widespread strong winds Thursday night. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. Use caution if you must drive.
